ARTICLE.VAL_1: I'm full-stack JS developer. Currently I switching my profession and learn WEB programming and plan to work in software development. Passed training at the IT-school "GoIT" on the course "Full stack developer" for one year. And another year I studied additional technologies independently, with the help of WEB-learning. Last time I develop my abilities in the stack (Angular, NestJs).
ARTICLE.VAL_2: in which this summary is posted is also written on these frameworks. And now I'm looking for a job in this stack. In general, my programming experience will be about two years of training projects.
ARTICLE.VAL_3: In the late 90s, I left the IT field and started working with electronic control systems for vehicle and automatic transmission units and worked on different technical stations. Now I am returning to the profession in IT.

TEXT.VAL_1: Project: Web Studio. Adaptive web-page of web studio. Technologies: HTML5 - CSS3 - SASS - BEM.
TEXT.VAL_2: Project: Donut Masterclass. Team project, mobile-first adaptive landing. My tasks on the project are the slider and the background. Technologies: HTML5 - CSS3 - JS - SASS - BEM.
TEXT.VAL_3: Project: Image finder. Search and view images. Technologies: JS-Handlebars-Parcel.
TEXT.VAL_4: Project: Event Booster. Team project, events finder. My tasks on the project, It's API and interaction of program modules. Technologies: JS-HTML5-SASS-Handlebars-Parcel.
TEXT.VAL_5: Project: Image finder. Image search and browsing, on React. Technologies: JS-TS-React-Webpack.
TEXT.VAL_6: Project: Phone book. Work with backend and user registration. Technologies: JS-TS-React-Redux-RTK-ReactRouter6-MUI-Webpack.
TEXT.VAL_8: Project: Kapusta-finance. Final team project. My job on the project was to creation the server. Technologies: NodeJS, MongoDB, Express.
TEXT.VAL_9: This is a collection of various features that I create in the process of practices on Angular, NestJs. It has front and back parts, and a registration procedure, after which each user works with his own data. Currently, Todo is ready and working, which uses the following technologies: Angular, NgRx, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Docker.
TEXT.VAL_10: IT School GoIT "Full stack developer" (February 2021 - February 2022)
TEXT.VAL_11: National Technical University of Ukraine "Kyiv Polytechnic Institute" (1992 - 1998)
TEXT.VAL_12: Computer systems and networks, Master's degree -System engineer

HOME.TITLE: Preface
HOME.TITLE_1: The source code can be viewed on GitHub at the links:
HOME.TEXT_1: This pet project is created during the practice of learning frameworks Angular and NestJs and has server and client parts. It's made as a collection of individual features that I add to it from simple to more difficult.
HOME.TEXT_2: The project has a registration and authorization procedure, after which each user works with his data.
HOME.TEXT_3: The aim of the project is the practical study of technologies of development and representation of my skills when applying for a job.
